TITLE: Micro-Credentials
DEF: Small, focused units of learning that certify specific skills or competencies
TASK: The Micro-credentials pattern consists of compact, focused units of learning that certify specific competencies or skills. This pattern addresses the demand for industry-aligned, personalized, and flexible learning experiences. To optimize the pattern, design micro-credentials with reliable assessments, relevant content, and clear learning objectives. Consideration should be given to stackability and transferability to other institutions or programs.
